review: So far we are pretty happy with it. Set up is a piece of cake. We have been prime members for years, so this was the next step. I'm a little unhappy with some of the selections. I had thought almost everything would be free to prime members, but this is just not the case. Over all its pretty good. The game selection really needs improvement, but I am sure if this takes off, it will improve.If you are contemplating buying this...go for it. We had thought about Apple TV, as I am a huge Apple fan. The specs on this box just blew them out of the water. Extremely fast response time when going thru the menu. Absolutely no lagging when watching movies or playing games. Definitely worth the price.
